description: Size: Net Vol.: 30.0 ml | 1.0 fl. oz.Suitable for: All Skin TypesSqualane & Phyto-Retinol Glow Face Oil is a lightweight fast-absorbing facial oil that intensely hydrates and restores radiance. Expertly crafted with two anti-ageing powerhouses, squalane and retinol, this face oil brightens and boosts elasticity. Squalene (with an 'e') is naturally produced by the body. It mimics the skin's sebum and regulates moisture, but with age, squalene starts getting reduced. Using skincare products made with squalane (a stabilized form of squalene) is the best remedy! Squalane, 100% derived from olives, strengthens the skin barrier and prevents transepidermal water loss. This helps reduce visible lines while enhancing skin elasticity. Phyto-retinol provides "retinol-like" activity resulting in effective anti-ageing and anti-photoageing action. This helps restore cells to a more youthful state, reducing signs of ageing, dark spots, and sun damage. Squalane & Retinol are a perfect match! title: Retinol Night Cream - Happy Hour
description: Size: 50.0 gmSuitable for: All Skin TypesRetinol Night Cream is crafted to synergistically enhance your skin's natural repair process as you sleep. This luxurious Korean beauty night cream helps reverse fine lines & wrinkles, leaving skin deightfully youthful and smooth. Retinol accelerates the skin renewal process and enhances collagen production. Hyaluronic Acid, being a powerful water binder, improves skin firmness and infuses precious moisture back into the deep layers of the skin. Vitamin C further enhances efficacy by fading hyperpigmented areas, brightening skin and neutralizing free radicals. Retinol, the gold standard for anti-ageing, is suitable for all skin types. However, the best way to use is to build tolerance over time. Massage a pea-sized amount using gentle upward and outward strokes until cream is absorbed fully, twice a week and keep increasing the frequency by an additional night every week. title: Alpha Eau De Parfum
description: Size: 100.0 ml 3.4 fl. oz.Perfume Notes:‚úî Magnetic Musk‚úî Spicy Cinnamon‚úî Refreshing Green AppleStrength: Strong, Long LastingOccasion: Perfect For Work, A Night Out.Introducing Alpha, the fragrance for men who embrace their alpha energy without apology. Designed in France, this eau de parfum is a true sign of masculinity, combining fiercely magnetic musk, invigorating and spicy cinnamon, and refreshing green apple for a powerful and irresistible scent. Alpha's unique and unmistakable signature scent is designed to make you stand out from the crowd. It exudes confidence and dominance, making it perfect for men who want to own their day and make a lasting impression. Fragrance Notes: This perfume combines fiercely magnetic musk, invigorating and spicy cinnamon, and refreshing green apple. Own your day by wearing it confidently and richly. Occasion: With Alpha, you'll feel confident and rich, ready to take on the world with unapologetic masculinity. title: Spanish Rosemary & Biotin Anti-Hairfall Shampoo
description: Size: 200.0 ml 6.8 fl. oz. Suitable for: All Hair Types Concerned about hairfall and breakage? Say hello to a transformative anti-hairfall solution: Spanish Rosemary & Biotin Anti-Hairfall Shampoo. Crafted with a powerful blend of Spanish Rosemary and Biotin, this shampoo strengthens hair by up to 95% effectively reducing hairfall. (Based on the Instrumental Test of Pilgrim Spanish Rosemary & Biotin Anti-Hairfall Shampoo, Conditioner & Oil vs Non-Conditioning Shampoo; Hairfall due to hair breakage). The world beauty secret in this anti-hairfall shampoo is Spanish Rosemary (Rosmarinus officinalis), a fragrant evergreen herb that hails from the sun-soaked Mediterranean region. Traditionally valued in Mediterranean countries to tackle hairfall, Spanish Rosemary oil has been used in hair rituals for hundreds of years. This ancient remedy has been supported by clinical studies which show that rosemary oil is effective in supporting hair growth. Here's how it works. Spanish Rosemary blocks the activity of Dihydrotestosterone (DHT), a hormone linked to hair loss. It stops DHT's harmful effects by inhibiting the enzyme 5 alpha-reductase, resulting in less hair fall. The formula gains an extra edge with Biotin, a B-complex vitamin that increases scalp circulation, increases hair density, and strengthens follicles. With every wash, this transformative shampoo rejuvenates strands. Experience the revitalizing touch of Spanish Rosemary & Biotin Anti-Hairfall Shampoo - your hair isn't just surviving; it's thriving. Spanish Rosemary (Rosmarinus officinalis) is a fragrant evergreen herb flourishing in the sun-soaked Mediterranean. Celebrated in Mediterranean cultures for its haircare benefits, its oil has been a cherished ingredient in hair rituals for ages. Notably, Spanish Rosemary is a powerful supporter of hair growth, a natural DHT blocker, and a promoter of hair strength. Moreover, its antioxidants battle cell-damaging free radicals while enhancing follicle blood flow to encourage vibrant hair development. It's no surprise that this versatile oil has been cherished for centuries in haircare. To unlock its full benefits, always dilute Spanish Rosemary Essential Oil with a carrier oil. Blend 2-3 drops of this essential oil with 1 tablespoon of a suitable carrier oil like almond, argan, jojoba, olive, or coconut oil. Gently massage the mixture onto your scalp and hair, fostering a nurturing touch. As an added step, conduct a patch test on your inner arm after dilution to ensure compatibility. With Pilgrim's Spanish Rosemary Essential Oil, your hair journey takes a transformative turn toward strength, resilience, and enduring shine. Marketed in India By: Heavenly Secrets Pvt. title: 3% Redensyl + 4% Anagain Hair Growth Serum.
description: Size: Net Vol.: 50.0 ml | 1.7 fl. oz.Suitable for: All Hair TypesThe Pilgrim Advanced Hair Growth Serum has been formulated with natural ingredients, proven by science to stop hair loss and promote new hair growth. It maintains the hair in optimal health thus reducing breakage. The ingredients, Redensyl and Anagain, are clinically proven to increase hair thickness & strength for longer & stronger hair. Redensyl, the breakthrough ingredient works by acting upon the hair follicles to induce new hair growth. Its regenerative properties prevent Alopecia by reducing hair loss and supporting the growth cycle. Anagain, derived from pea sprout extract stimulates new hair growth and prolongs the life cycle of the hair. It restores vitality and density for fuller, lustrous hair. Zinc and Green Tea extract condition and strengthen the hair. Formulated as a lightweight leave-on treatment, this serum is absorbed quickly and leaves the scalp soothed and comfortable. Additional Information: Manufactured By: Naturis Cosmetics Pvt. title: 25% AHA, 2% BHA, 5% PHA Peeling Solution - ‚Çπ1 Flash Sale
description: Size: Net Vol.: 30.0 ml | 1.0 fl. oz.Suitable for: All Skin TypesTreat yourself to the luxury of an at-home facial with the Pilgrim 25% AHA, 2% BHA, and 5% PHA Peeling Solution. It gently exfoliates the top layer of dead skin cells to reveal fresh skin underneath. A perfect blend of Glycolic Acid, Salicylic Acid, and Lactic Acid that comes together to enhance skin texture & tone. It minimizes the appearance of pore, and discolourations. Supported by Aloe and Hyaluronic Acid, it brightens and resurfaces the skin. Glycolic Acid, an Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA), is a gentle yet effective exfoliator that gets rid of the surface of dead skin cells. It simultaneously offers soothing hydration to the skin. Salicylic acid, a Beta Hydroxy Acid (BHA), is known to penetrate beneath the surface and refines pores. Breaks down blackheads and whiteheads over time. Refines texture for a blemish-free complexion. Lactic acid offers visible brightening and improved elasticity. Fades dark spots and reduces discolorations for even-toned, luminous skin. Visible radiance with peeling solution!Additional Information: Manufactured By: Naturis Cosmetics Pvt. title: FREE 24K Gold Facial Mask
description: Size: Net Wt.: 50.0 gm | 1.8 oz.Suitable for: All Skin TypesDesigned as the Ultimate Pre-event beauty ritual, the Pilgrim 24K Gold Facial Mask lights up the skin with an opulent, radiant glow. A powerful, precious metal, Gold has been used since time immemorial to enhance and preserve a bright & beautiful complexion. The colloidal and ultrafine particles brighten the skin for a lit-from-within effect. It imparts a sheen that looks just as gorgeous on its own as it does under makeup. Gold particles infuse into the deeper skin layers and boost collagen production to restore its elasticity. title: Spanish Rosemary Anti-Hairfall Shampoo
description: Size: 200.0 ml 6.8 fl. oz. Suitable for: All Hair Types Concerned about hairfall and breakage? Say hello to a transformative anti-hairfall solution: Spanish Rosemary Anti-Hairfall Shampoo with Biotin. Crafted with a powerful blend of Spanish Rosemary and Biotin, this shampoo strengthens hair by up to 95%*, effectively reducing hairfall. (Based on the Instrumental Test of Pilgrim Spanish Rosemary & Biotin Anti-Hairfall Shampoo, Conditioner & Oil vs Non-Conditioning Shampoo; Hairfall due to hair breakage). The world beauty secret in this anti-hairfall shampoo is Spanish Rosemary (Rosmarinus officinalis), a fragrant evergreen herb that hails from the sun-soaked Mediterranean region. Traditionally valued in Mediterranean countries to tackle hairfall, Spanish Rosemary oil has been used in hair rituals for hundreds of years. This ancient remedy has been supported by clinical studies which show that rosemary oil is effective in supporting hair growth. Here's how it works. Spanish Rosemary blocks the activity of Dihydrotestosterone (DHT), a hormone linked to hair loss. It stops DHT's harmful effects by inhibiting the enzyme 5 alpha-reductase, resulting in less hair fall. The formula gains an extra edge with Biotin, a B-complex vitamin that increases scalp circulation, increases hair density, and strengthens follicles. With every wash, this transformative shampoo rejuvenates strands. Experience the revitalizing touch of Spanish Rosemary & Biotin Anti-Hairfall Shampoo - your hair isn't just surviving; it's thriving. title: Spanish Rosemary & Biotin Anti-Hairfall Shampoo - ‚Çπ1 Flash Sale
description: Size: 200.0 ml 6.8 fl. oz. Suitable for: All Hair Types Concerned about hairfall and breakage? Say hello to a transformative anti-hairfall solution: Spanish Rosemary & Biotin Anti-Hairfall Shampoo. Crafted with a powerful blend of Spanish Rosemary and Biotin, this shampoo strengthens hair by up to 95% effectively reducing hairfall. (Based on the Instrumental Test of Pilgrim Spanish Rosemary & Biotin Anti-Hairfall Shampoo, Conditioner & Oil vs Non-Conditioning Shampoo; Hairfall due to hair breakage). The world beauty secret in this anti-hairfall shampoo is Spanish Rosemary (Rosmarinus officinalis), a fragrant evergreen herb that hails from the sun-soaked Mediterranean region. Traditionally valued in Mediterranean countries to tackle hairfall, Spanish Rosemary oil has been used in hair rituals for hundreds of years. This ancient remedy has been supported by clinical studies which show that rosemary oil is effective in supporting hair growth. Here's how it works. Spanish Rosemary blocks the activity of Dihydrotestosterone (DHT), a hormone linked to hair loss. It stops DHT's harmful effects by inhibiting the enzyme 5 alpha-reductase, resulting in less hair fall. The formula gains an extra edge with Biotin, a B-complex vitamin that increases scalp circulation, increases hair density, and strengthens follicles. With every wash, this transformative shampoo rejuvenates strands. Experience the revitalizing touch of Spanish Rosemary & Biotin Anti-Hairfall Shampoo - your hair isn't just surviving; it's thriving. description: Size: 200.0 ml 6.8 fl. oz. Suitable for: All Hair Types Concerned about hairfall and breakage? Say hello to a transformative anti-hairfall solution: Spanish Rosemary & Biotin Anti-Hairfall Shampoo. Crafted with a powerful blend of Spanish Rosemary and Biotin, this shampoo strengthens hair by up to 95% effectively reducing hairfall. (Based on the Instrumental Test of Pilgrim Spanish Rosemary & Biotin Anti-Hairfall Shampoo, Conditioner & Oil vs Non-Conditioning Shampoo; Hairfall due to hair breakage). The world beauty secret in this anti-hairfall shampoo is Spanish Rosemary (Rosmarinus officinalis), a fragrant evergreen herb that hails from the sun-soaked Mediterranean region. Traditionally valued in Mediterranean countries to tackle hairfall, Spanish Rosemary oil has been used in hair rituals for hundreds of years. This ancient remedy has been supported by clinical studies which show that rosemary oil is effective in supporting hair growth. Here's how it works. Spanish Rosemary blocks the activity of Dihydrotestosterone (DHT), a hormone linked to hair loss. It stops DHT's harmful effects by inhibiting the enzyme 5 alpha-reductase, resulting in less hair fall. The formula gains an extra edge with Biotin, a B-complex vitamin that increases scalp circulation, increases hair density, and strengthens follicles. With every wash, this transformative shampoo rejuvenates strands. Experience the revitalizing touch of Spanish Rosemary & Biotin Anti-Hairfall Shampoo - your hair isn't just surviving; it's thriving. Expertly crafted with radiance-inducing Gold leaf and skin-enhancing ingredients like Mulberry extract, Niacinamide & Hyaluronic acid, the serum brightens and gives the skin a youthful glow. The ultrafine Gold particles provide a luminous sheen and visibly reduce redness. They promote the production of collagen and microcirculation, keeping the skin firm & healthy. Shields against sun damage to prevent photoaging. Mulberry is a rich source of Vitamin C and antioxidative phytonutrients that brighten and protect the skin. Niacinamide strengthens the skin barrier function, reduces the appearance of pores, and regulates sebum production. So, it reduces breakouts and helps the skin remain free from blemishes. Hyaluronic Acid is a skincare superhero that deeply hydrates and fills out fine lines & wrinkles. It pulls in moisture to plump up the skin. The resultant high saturation of water just beneath the surface creates the "Glass Skin" effect that is all about that healthy, reflective glow. The versatile serum can be used before applying heavier complexion products for a smooth, crease-free, and dewy finish. Use it as a make-up primer to get the beautiful "Glass-Skin" effect now!Additional Information: Manufactured By: Naturis Cosmetics Pvt. description: Size: 20 ml | 0.67 fl. oz. At the heart of this serum lies 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, a stable and highly effective derivative of Vitamin C. With its potent concentration, this form of Vitamin C penetrates deep into the skin, targeting dark spots, uneven tone, and dullness. Unlike traditional Vitamin C formulations, the stability of 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid ensures that the serum remains potent and effective for a longer period, providing lasting benefits for your skin. Complementing the brightening effects of Vitamin C is our special world ingredient, Australian Kakadu Plum extract, renowned for its exceptional antioxidant properties. With 100 times more Vitamin C than an orange, Kakadu Plum provides protection against environmental stressors, promoting overall skin health. Furthermore, the serum features Niacinamide, which helps to fade dark spots and hyperpigmentation, while simultaneously brightening the skin and improving its overall health. But that's not all ‚Äì our serum goes beyond brightening. The blend of Vitamin C, Ferulic acid, and Vitamin E shields skin from damage caused by the sun's UV radiation, keeping your skin youthful. Fragrance-free. Non-toxic. Suitable for all skin types. Whether you're struggling with dark spots, uneven tone, or dullness, the 15% Vitamin C Serum for Advanced Brightness is here to transform your skin and unleash its full potential. title: 10% Vitamin C Face Serum For Daily Brightness (30 ml)
description: Size: 30 ml 1.01 fl. oz. Suitable For: All Skin Types Achieve glowing, brighter skin in just 5 days* (clinically tested) with the specially formulated 10% Vitamin C (3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid) face serum with 5% Niacinamide. This powerful combination works wonders to effectively diminish dark spots and hyperpigmentation, helping you reduce dark spots in as little as 3 days. Perfect for beginners, this serum addresses discolourations and evens out your skin tone, resulting in a smoother, more balanced skin tone. The naturally occurring form of vitamin C is highly unstable so there is a skincare hero which is a derivative of Vitamin C, known as 3-O-Ethyl ascorbic acid. The stable form of Vitamin C used in the serum is known for its ability to brighten and enhance skin radiance. It fades pigmentation and provides a powerful antioxidant boost, protecting your skin from environmental damage and promoting a youthful glow. Complementing this, Niacinamide, a form of Vitamin B3, reduces pigmentation, strengthens the skin barrier, and improves overall skin brightness. It also has soothing properties, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. The 10% Vitamin C formula is further enriched with Australian Kakadu Plum, one of the richest natural sources of Vitamin C. This potent ingredient contains 100 times more Vitamin C than an orange and is packed with antioxidants that improve skin texture and brightness. The combined action of these ingredients targets dark spots and uneven skin tone, giving you a brighter and more radiant complexion. Experience the transformative effects of our serum, which not only brightens and fades pigmentation but also strengthens and protects your skin. With regular use, you'll notice significant improvements in skin texture, tone, and overall health. Say goodbye to dark spots and hello to a luminous, even complexion with our potent, beginner-friendly serum. Enjoy the confidence of glowing, brighter skin in just 5 days.*Based on consumer feedback from a clinical study conducted in March 2024 by an independent lab Marketed in India by: Heavenly Secrets Pvt. This potent serum is designed to work synergistically with the Australian Tea Tree Anti-Dandruff Shampoo, Hair Mask, and Conditioner for comprehensive dandruff care. Formulated to tackle the root causes of dandruff, it effectively minimizes flakiness and itching. By targeting the underlying issues, the serum removes dandruff from the root, ensuring a long-lasting solution to a healthier scalp. It helps restore and maintain a healthy scalp microbiome by regulating microbial balance, preventing the recurrence of dandruff and promoting overall scalp health. The serum also hydrates and moisturizes the scalp, relieving itchiness and reducing inflammation associated with dandruff-prone scalps. Formulated with the Australian Tea Tree provides natural antifungal and antibacterial properties, combating dandruff by reducing Malassezia (fungal) growth. Zinc Pyrithione (ZPT) and Piroctone Olamine, both gentle antifungal ingredients, further regulate scalp flora, soothing irritation and reducing itching. Additionally, Cutibiome CLR, a patented active ingredient, is designed to improve scalp health and manage dandruff effectively. This scalp serum is fragrance-free and formulated to be gentle yet effective, making it suitable for all hair types. Its deep conditioning properties ensure that your scalp stays moisturized, preventing dryness and flakiness. By incorporating this serum into your hair care routine, you can achieve a flake-free, balanced, and healthy scalp. Experience the confidence of a clear, itch-free scalp with our Anti-Dandruff Scalp Serum, your ultimate solution for comprehensive dandruff care.
